mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.forum_name as forumName ,a.duzhe_id as duzheId ,a.users_id as usersId ,a.forum_content as forumContent ,a.super_ids as superIds ,a.forum_types as forumTypes ,a.forum_state_types as forumStateTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.update_time as updateTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,duzhe.duzhe_uuid_number as duzheUuidNumber ,duzhe.duzhe_name as duzheName ,duzhe.duzhe_phone as duzhePhone ,duzhe.duzhe_id_number as duzheIdNumber ,duzhe.duzhe_photo as duzhePhoto ,duzhe.duzhe_types as duzheTypes ,duzhe.duzhe_email as duzheEmail ,users.username as uusername ,users.password as upassword ,users.role as urole ,users.addtime as uaddtime
FROM forum a left JOIN duzhe duzhe ON a.duzhe_id = duzhe.id left JOIN users users ON a.users_id = users.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.forum_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.forumName},'%')
and ( a.duzhe_id = #{params.duzheId} )
and ( a.users_id = #{params.usersId} )
and a.forum_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.forumContent},'%')
and a.super_ids >= #{params.superIdsStart}
and a.super_ids <= #{params.superIdsEnd}
and a.super_ids = #{params.superIds}
and a.forum_types = #{params.forumTypes}
and a.forum_state_types = #{params.forumStateTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeEnd})
and a.duzhe_id IS NOT NULL
and duzhe.duzhe_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.duzheUuidNumber},'%')
and duzhe.duzhe_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.duzheName},'%')
and duzhe.duzhe_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.duzhePhone},'%')
and duzhe.duzhe_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.duzheIdNumber},'%')
and duzhe.duzhe_types = #{params.duzheTypes}
and duzhe.duzhe_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.duzheEmail},'%')
and a.users_id IS NOT NULL
and users.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and users.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and users.role like CONCAT('%',#{params.role},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(users.addtime) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.addtimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(users.addtime) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.addtimeEnd})
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
